Package com.flag4j.concurrency

package com.flag4j.concurrency
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    BinaryOperation<T extends Number>
    Interface for creating a closed binary operation lambda for use in the ConcurrentOperation class.
    UnaryOperation<T extends Number>
    Interface for creating a closed unary operation lambda for use in the ConcurrentOperation class.
    ZeroOperation<T>
    An interface for creating operations which require no parameters.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BuiltInOperations
    This class contains several built in operations for use in the ConcurrentOperation.
    ConcurrentOperation<T extends Number,​U extends TypedMatrix<T>>
    A class for applying concurrent operations to matrices.
    Configurations
    Configurations for concurrent operations.
